column30: Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"At the beginning:

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": where you and your designated teams will embark on an exciting journey to create a tech startup from scratch.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Objective: The goal of the Startup Challenge is to complete as many tasks necessary to launch a startup. You will earn points for completing various tasks
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": each contributing to the success of your project. Prioritization and teamwork is key.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Problem space: you will have to choose a problem space to work on. No existing startup allowed! (Not even from previous mini-challenges)
Team Formation: You will be divided into teams of 3 to 4 participants.
Your team will have a list of challenges
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": each with a specific number of points associated with it. These challenges are designed to guide you in developing your startup project. Here's the list of challenges and their points:

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": User Interviews: Conduct a REAL user interview (out of cohort) to gather insights and feedback on your startup idea. (100 points each)
1-Minute Video of Elevator Pitch (40 points): Create a concise and engaging 1-minute video that presents your elevator pitch. With your phone!
Logo (5 points): Create a unique and memorable logo for your startup project.
6-Slide Pitch Presentation (30 points): Craft a compelling 6-slide pitch presentation that effectively communicates your startup idea.
Landing Page (30 points): Design a captivating landing page that showcases your project's value proposition.
Figma Product Design (50 points): Develop a Figma prototype that demonstrates the functionality and user experience of your product.
User Onboarding Flow (50 points): Design an efficient user onboarding process that guides users in using your product effectively.
LinkedIn Page (15 points): Create a professional LinkedIn page for your startup project
Find 10 ways to promote your product for free (30 points)
Build community of 50 people [for B2C only] (200 points each 50 members)
Sign LOI with someone [for B2B only] (150 points each LOI)
Teams will choose which challenges to undertake based on their points and project strategy.
Each completed challenge will earn your team the specified points.
The team with the most points at the end of the challenge will be declared the winner.
Post your results in the slack #cofounderboat channel – Open a thread with your group name and input your documents!
Teams will be scored based on the total points earned from completed challenges.
A 100 EUR amazon gift card per team member will be awarded to the winning team.

Date:"2025-06-24T13:00:00.000Z": who pay for tools from their own money are NOT considered B2B customers. They are Prosumers. A B2B Customer considered for full LOI points should pay from company expenses (have cashflow) and have at least 1 Full-time employee.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Warning: :warning: We will deduct points for incomplete or poor task completions.
An LOI must have a digital or physical signature. Emails are not accepted!
a user interview should be an actual conversation with a potential user. Submission should be a recap of that conversation with key learnings!
One of your co-founders is about to be poached by a competitor!
You’ll get a random new teammate to replace them.
Annoying Investor Alert - YOU ONLY HAVE UNTIL 12:10!!!
An annoying investor needs you to show up right now. The investor shows no mercy and requires you to give an update right away.

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": you now only have until 12:10 to submit.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Any submissions after 12:10 are not counted and lead to disqualification.
please submit to the #submissions channel until 12:10 and come back to the creativity room for a few minutes for a debrief
We've been generally happy about the attendance rate of the batch. However
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": this is a reminder that participation is a core part of the Pioneers experience
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": both for exercices and masterclasses. Do ensure you make all of them.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": FYI: starting next week the schedule will be much lighter
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": the effort is required mainly for this week.
you must message @Niklas - Pioneers Team  ideally 12 hours before the session starts.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": If we don’t hear from you
This rule now applies to all future exercices/masterclass sessions.
Thanks and see you at 2pm in the Creativity room for the Sales and GTM session !"
Today we have the AWS sessions (first with Connor
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": then with AWS engineers in Share) and the Friday pitches on the agenda.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Here is the order of teams pitching today:
Umamy - @Connor Blair and @StéphaneMillet (given the nice circumstances we do not expect Stéphane to join of course)
The pitch will be in person in the Share Zone for those who are in a team.
If you cannot come in person or if you want to follow the pitches but you are not in a team
Google Meet Link (the link is also in the calendar)"
15 min intro and then mostly focus on Q&A
Bakr was able to answer tech and non-tech answers in detail + very charismatic
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": massive difference compared to Google - would get Bakr for sure again for the next batch!
Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"Reminder right before

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": The AWS session with @Connor Blair is currently ongoing until 2:55. Once that is done
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": we meet at 3 pm sharp in the AWS room in the Share Zone (right side first floor when you come from the Create Zone).

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": This was very hard decision to make as we’ve been working alongside you for a long time and have developed affinities with each team. Also
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": we can make mistakes – companies we’ve rejected in the past have gone to be great companies!

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": So….. After careful evaluation and deliberations with Hugo and the Pioneers team
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": the following startups have been selected for the Investment Committee:

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": A reminder of the Selection criteria (in order of importance):
Execution – GTM traction and product progress
Office Hours: For the teams not moving forward
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": we’re hosting a feedback session starting at 3pm at the Hogwarts Room next to our space. Please text @Niklas - Pioneers Team  to book your slot.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": We do realise that some teams are too early in their adventure and need a bit more time (August timing wasn’t great): we are forecasting to host one more IC in about a month – if you show traction
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": reach out to us. Any team in the sprint phase is eligible.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Post-IC For those not advancing: you may stay at Station F until the end of November
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": but since you’re not officially in the program anymore
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": you would need to cover the cost your seat (€259 + VAT/month/per seat). You all may stay at the Pioneers space until Monday without additional cost.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": And ofcourse: you are now part of the Pioneers alumni community meaning you will be invited to our events
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": workshops and will be fasttracked for consideration for future cohorts :muscle:

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Now it’s time for the remaining teams to rock it during the IC this Friday
I just want to take a moment to say how proud you can be of what you’ve accomplished so far. Whether you’re moving forward to the IC or not
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": this is just one step in a much longer journey.
building a company is a marathon with many ups and downs; today’s decision doesn’t define your future. What matters is the grit
Speaker:"Lancelot de Boisjolly": and persistence you bring to the adventure. Keep pushing
Emails:"ldeboisjolly@sharpstone.fr; gtaa: and remember that every milestone (even the tough ones) is part of building something truly meaningful.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": We’re rooting for all of you!

Notes / Feedback:"Important feedback:: Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"An hour before :

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Pitch Day Today at 5 pm - Only Teams
Quick clarification: Pitch Day today is only for people in teams.
(Pro tip: even if you’re still early and not 100% sure —> join a team! Breakups aren’t a taboo :nerd_face:)
Apologies for not making this clearer earlier!"

column21: Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"@channel Hey everyone

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Happy to be back in Station F after my SF trip - glad to tell you that we're building an insane US track for you!
Here’s everything you need to know about Selection Day
Selection Day is the first filter of the program. The main goal of this milestone is to:
1. make sure you are in a team
2. make sure you're on the right track
Team & Idea – You have locked your team & are fixed on your problem space.
Progress made – You have shown progress: clear user feedback
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": signs of traction or market interest.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Ambition & vision – Here we make sure the size of your ambition aligns with ours :)
MOAT - You understand what your differentiating factor is.
For solofounders who've decided to pursue the lonely path - we will evaluate your progress as well.
The following Friday we shall announce those who have passed the selection. Good luck!
Each team will pitch in front of the investment committee.
Your pitch should clearly cover: problem
Each team will be assigned a slot and will only join the session on their slot.
It is possible to pitch remotely
-> This is the culmination of 8 weeks of work. Be sharp
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": and show us why you’re the right team for this problem."
fields:{"Name":"Group work 2 - Startup C: fields:{"Name":"Selection Day - Result Announcement (+ OH + beer same day)"

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": thank you for your commitment and effort over the past six weeks. You all deserve a lot of credit. Evaluating your progress wasn’t easy. We faced several edge cases

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": A note to those not selected:

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": keep building. We’re fully aware that we can make mistakes. Also
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": some of the best founders I backed at Hook had pitched to us multiple times before getting an investment. You remain part of the Pioneers community and and we’ll be keeping an eye on your progress.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": This is far from a win. You’ve cleared a checkpoint but there’s still a long way to go to be investment-ready for the IC. There were no clear yes and you’ll all need to seriously accelerate execution and focus on validating core assumptions.
We’ll be available tomorrow to answer questions. Feel free to ask about the decision-making
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": and share your honest feedback with us to help us improve.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": For those not continuing in the sprint phase
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": we’ll outboard you on Tuesday. You can always come back for a meeting
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": and we will send you an invite.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Let’s celebrate the past weeks together over drinks - you’ve earned it!

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": you remain part of the Pioneers community and we will invite you to events in the next months (stay tuned for a get-together after IC in September with the batch + friends).

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Please also stay active with us on Slack
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": and let us know whenever the community can support you. Thank you again for your dedication and openness throughout this journey so far.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Below are the Selection Day results and the list of teams moving forward to the Sprint Phase."

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": It's time to own up to your startup adventure!
Presenting your startup journey to your network is a key step to unlock opportunities: clients
Date:"2025-06-24T13:00:00.000Z": many positives can come from it.  So now that you're in the sprint phase you can share your adventure to the world!

We're solving <<the problem you're tackling>> and here's why it matters: <<your unique insight>>.

Date:"2025-06-24T13:00:00.000Z": fields:{"Name":"Slack message - the day before kick-off"

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Awesome to have you with us. We can’t wait to welcome you tomorrow for the official Pioneers SU2025 Kick-off!
We’ll keep it short — here’s everything you need to be ready:
:identification_card: Bring your ID to get onboarded
Add the Pioneers Calendar – Link here
Say hi on Slack in #su25-introduce-yourself – we want to hear from you!
Join us on WhatsApp – 3 people are still missing from the group. If that’s you
A quick heads-up for this week (especially for those who want to go to Viva Tech):
:jigsaw: Thursday is Basecamp Day – the key date to set you up for the program. We therefore make this a mandatory day for everyone who is in Paris.
:technologist: Friday is kept largely open for those planning to go to VivaTech.
:date: I'm planning to go to VivaTech on Saturday. If you’re also planning to go that day
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": click on this emoji :point_right::skin-tone-2: :mechanical_arm: so we can coordinate and potentially go as a group.

Adhityan KV: Slack Instruction & Email Commu:":warning: :warning:Other Reminder: where are your weekly updates?

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": I've noticed many teams forgot to submit their weekly updates. Please share your weekly update in Slack every Monday before day-end. It’s essential for tracking progress and informing the investment committee.

Date:"2025-06-24T13:00:00.000Z": fields:{"Name":"2nd Slack Message - Slack + WhatsApp overview"

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Just a quick welcome again from my side—excited to be here with all of you!
A few words on how we use the Slack channels:
:loudspeaker: su25-announcements – For important updates from the staff team. Please don’t post here (but feel free to comment if anything is unclear).
:speech_balloon: su25-general – Open to post for everyone: questions related to the program/event/calendar
:raising_hand: su25-introduce-yourself – We'll ask everyone to write a short intro. I’ll start tomorrow - please follow up.

fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": breakups. Every change is progress and is therefore celebrated! More info about the setup soon.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": :handshake: ask-for-intros – Need to validate something? Ask for intro help here. Be specific about the type of person you're looking to talk to. Use it to learn—not sell right away (unless they offer).

column39: Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"Slack message 1 (30 min before the exercise):

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Just a quick reminder that we’ll meet again at 2:00 PM in the Creativity Room (inside the Share Zone).
We’ll start with a short presentation about Pioneers
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": followed by a Q&A in case you have any questions. After that
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": we’ll dive into our first group exercise: “Worst Startup Ever” :boom:

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Here are your groups for the session:
create groups of 3 & 4 people and list them here!!
Come up with the most ridiculously bad startup idea you can think of — and pitch it like it’s the next unicorn.

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": create and pitch the worst startup idea possible — one that is:

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Incredibly niche or solves a non-problem (e.g. throw AI at everything - solution in search of a problem)

Date:"2025-06-24T13:00:00.000Z": fields:{"Name":"AWS for new Founders - Announcement Update (w Connor)"
Adhityan KV: Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"Event announcement update (with Connor giving an AWS session before):

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": we have an AWS session this Friday from 3–4 PM in the AWS Room (Share Zone). But since we already have our own AWS expert @Connor Blair here
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": we’re turning it into a double session!

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": We'll kick things off in the Nebuchadnezzar Room (right in front of the Pioneers space)
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": where Connor will briefly walk you through the key AWS points and answer questions from an independent expert’s perspective.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Then we move over to the AWS Room (Share Zone) for a short presentation and open Q&A with two AWS engineers. A great chance to ask questions - maybe even the same ones again and compare the answers from the “more biased” AWS side.
We encourage critical questions - cloud infra is often one of the backbones of your startup and AWS wants to sell to you.
2:30–3:00 PM: Nebuchadnezzar Room – AWS with @Connor Blair
3:00–4:00 PM: AWS Room (Share Zone) – AWS engineer presentation + Q&A
Both events are in the calendar. Looking forward to a full-circle session from both an independent expert and AWS itself!

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": please react with :fire: if you are coming."

fields:{"Name":"Group work 2 - Startup C: Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"@channel Hi everyone

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": I'm super excited to welcome you to the Pioneers program starting next week.
You’re now part of a group of 32 brillant & ambitious minds with one shared goal: launch a global tech company from scratch.

fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": and grind together for the next 3 months.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": This Slack workspace is our main communication hub.
Turn on mobile notifications to stay in the loop.
We’ll use this space to share:
Add this Google Calendar to your personal calendar to stay updated:
July 30 – Selection Day / Team Lock Deadline
September 8 – Pre-Investment Committee: All teams to pitch for qualification to the investment committee
September 12 – Investment Committee - decision time on investment and integration in final phase

fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": and I will be here daily to guide and support you. Don't hesitate to ping us for anything.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": More info on key milestones will be shared over the coming weeks.
See you on Wednesday — and happy building!"
Tomorrow is the big one - Investment Committee Day!
This is the moment where your hard work comes together and decisions are made.
Please make sure your pitch deck includes:
A progress slide showing your journey from the start until now (no need to break it down by last week/this week).
An ask slide detailing how you would use the €100K investment and which milestones it will help you reach.
Send me your deck by tomorrow 3:00 PM.
I will text you a few minutes before your turn to get ready.
This is it - time to bring your story to life
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": and make the case for a €100K investment.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Good luck - we’re excited to see you shine on the IC stage! :fire:"
Please read - today is a rather big day as we will be filming and have a cool guest:)
Please drop your Google Doc in #submissions before 13:30.
Come to our space until 13:15 to get your Pioneers t-shirt. We ask you to wear it today.
:rocket: Big Session in the Creativity Room — 13:30
Cameras will be there to film the session - and of course you wearing the Pioneers t-shirts!

fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": Slack Instruction & Email Commu:"15 min before:

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": we have our first small challenge on customer discovery.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": More challenges will follow as we try to incorporate your feedback to understand how others work.
You’ll be working in teams of 3 for a rapid-fire customer discovery exercise.
Get on as many calls as possible. Talk to real people and uncover real problems. Do not pitch ideas or solutions—just listen and learn. Use the #ask-for-intros channel.
Pick a problem space (we assigned one to you - but you can also change it if your team agrees to it)

createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": get them on the phone. Use the Mom Test approach to ask better questions and get useful insights.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": :phone: The more you're on the phone
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": the better. Ideally call together as a group.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": What methodology used to get leads (bullet points only)
Key learnings (if you manage to get on calls)
We’ll meet again to share learnings and reflections from 5:45 to 6:15pm.
Let’s go out there and talk to people!
@channel PRO-TIP: don't hesitate to ask the batch for referrals or contacts in certain industries. Use the #ask-anything channel

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": :clap: Well done everyone – today’s Pre-IC was a big milestone. You’ve all put in 3 months of intense work
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": and it showed. I saw some big leaps of improvement in your pitches (but there’s still some work to do though :slightly_smiling_face: ).

Date:"2025-06-24T13:00:00.000Z": fields:{"Name":"IC Email to LPs and Venture Partners"

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": We’re just three days away from the first-ever Pioneers Investment Committee.
This is the culmination of 3 months of our Pioneers founders matching
fields:{"Name":"Sharpstone office hours": and building ferociously at Station F to launch a global tech company. This Friday is where the most promising founders pitch to our committee to unlock a €100K investment for 7% of their company
Speaker:"Lancelot de Boisjolly": securing a spot in the next stage of the program
Date:"2025-06-24T13:00:00.000Z": and we’re happy to share this moment with you.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": 16:20-18:00 - Startup pitches (5 min pitch + 10 min Q&A)
18:00 onwards - Drinks. We’ll bring a couple of drinks to close out IC and would love if you to stay for a bit and join us.
-> We’ve sent you Station F invites and you may contact Niklas upon arrival to be guided in the conference room: +33 6 25 36 78 65
Ideally plan to arrive a few minutes early and bring a laptop to submit evaluations in real time.
We want your live input: After each pitch
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": please fill out this short scorecard.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Here’s the Selection criteria by level of importance:
We’ve prepared an overview of the pitching startups with:
Each team’s progress since joining the program
My personal comments on each team
A startup needs at least 3 out of 4 votes to be eligible for investment.
LPs’ Consultative Vote: Please use the Scorecard above to share your opinion on the selection. Your vote is advisory but will be considered in deliberations.
This is the most important milestone for our founders in the program
createdTime:"2025-06-24T09:54:18.000Z": and your perspective makes the difference. Come ready to challenge the teams and help us decide who should get investment and a spot in the next stage.

{"records":[{"id":"rec0QMuhZc4LrLh9w": Thanks again for joining us and for your trust. Looking forward to seeing you on Friday.
